    Publications

    • Yi, W., Palmer, C., Serian, A., Roy, M. (2024). Individual endogenous rhythms maximize music-induced pain reduction. submitted.

    • Høffding, S.*, Yi, W. *, Lippert, E., Gonzalez Sanchez, V., Bishop, L., Laeng, B., Danielsen, A., Jensenius, A. & Wallot, S. (2023). Into the Hive-mind: Shared absorption and cardiac interrelations in expert and student string quartets. Music & Science, 6, doi: 10.1177/20592043231168597.
